# Scripts

Bundled resources for accessibility-test-scanner skill

- [x] wcag_guidelines.py: Script to fetch and parse WCAG guidelines from the web, providing a structured format for Claude to reference.
- [x] aria_validator.py: Script to validate ARIA attributes against best practices and standards.
- [x] report_generator.py: Script to generate detailed accessibility reports in various formats (e.g., Markdown, JSON).
